WorkItem.Description:
now Wow ver.3.22 top armor penetration is 1400=100%
 
rawr V2.2.23 top armor penetration is still 1232=100%
 
Please correct it

Comments.Message:
The top armorpen rating is in there; a little more precise of a number than what you gave (blame rounding for that) but it's in there

it's in the Rare.base:StatConversion.cs file

So if you can supply the model that you used to justify your comment please do so.

I live in Taiwan , my English is bad

I don't know how to explain my discovery

can anybody understand me ??
We completely understand what you are saying, but you didn't tell us which Model is having the problem, Retribution? DPSDK? what?
Oh , It is hunter Model having the problem

And there is another problem 
Why death's verdict level 258 DPS is less death's verdict level 245 in hunter model ?

The Hunter module is manually handling Trinkets based upon work done in the Hunter Spreadsheets (and by that I mean LITERALLY copying their formulas). This is causing problems with several trinkets and other modeled effects.

The Armor Penetration listed on the tooltip is indeed incorrect but note that this is just a tooltip issue, it's not actually breaking the calculations.

And another  problem

Why duration(in seconds) of hunter Options can effect attack speed when I only Equip range weapon and useTalents 0/0/0 ??

Is that wrong ??
I think it has to do with Rapid Shot uptime

The wrong  Armor Penetration will make wrong DPS calculations

14 Armor Penetration rating = 1%enemy armor reduced and 12.32Armor Penetration rating =  1%enemy armor reduced is very different  , it will make every 1 Armor Penetration rating of DPS calculations different

So all rawr V2.2.23 DPS calculations of hunter is wrong value

This is a very big problem , Please fix it 

Thank you !!

About attack speed 

I only equip range weapon , no buffs , Talents 0/0/0 , all things do not use
Only equip range weapon , when I change duration(in seconds) then attack speed was changed

Why?? I think that is not correct !!

Whilst I am aware of English not being your first language. Are you aware of just how rude, irritating and down right annoying you are being saying. X is wrong fix it NOW. You sound like a small child screaming because their toy fell out of their pram. 

The hunter model is currently a very poor model as it is struggling not having an active developer. So unless you are prepared to actually help code the hunter model and make it right please stop posting issues in this fashion.
As I already stated about the ArP, it's JUST THE TOOLTIP, it's NOT THE ACTUAL VALUE IT'S USING so don't whine about it, calculationaly it's doing what it is supposed to.

I only can use yahoo Translation software

so I only can describe directly

I am sorry about all

thank you for answer me
